resources.string: I accept the terms and conditions
You need to accept the terms and conditions

1 - By downloading or using the app, these terms will automatically apply to you – you should make sure therefore that you read them carefully before using the app. You’re not allowed to copy, or modify the app, any part of the app, or our trademarks in any way. You’re not allowed to attempt to extract the source code of the app, and you also shouldn’t try to translate the app into other languages, or make derivative versions. The app itself, and all the trade marks, copyright, database rights and other intellectual property rights related to it, still belong to Realtest.
2 - We do not keep any register of your past locations in any way. We only have 1 (one) register of your last location.

3 - We are not responsible for inacurate locations. We use combined signals of GPS satellites, cell phone networlk and wifi to determinite the most precise location, however these signals can present variations and inacurate mesurements. You need to be aware of that.
4 - We are offering this app to you without any cost, however, we show ads.

5 - You will be allowed to use limited number of licences, that will allow you to track a limited number of people. You can increase the number by purchasing more licences. We can change the prices of the licences and the number of free licence without warning, at any time.
6 - We can suspend and terminate any account that we find suspicious at any time without warning.
this is taking longer than usual...
Nobody is on your map yet...
- Type your invitation codes to accept invitations from other users.
Click on the search icon and go forward to the person you want to zoom in.
Please turn on your GPS to sign in
Show this place in my map
This tutorial will guide you through 4 steps to configure your Family Locator.
We need to know your location!
Step 2:\nSign in with your Google account.
We will get your name, email and picture from your Google account.
Receive notifications when your contacts enter or leave a place!

Click on the icon to add people on your map:

- Friends
- Family
- Anybody!

Receive notifications when people arrive or leave:

- Home
- Work
- School
Locator lets you see the location of other users on the map in real time.
- Invite people to your map by clicking on the "add users" icon on the main screen. You will send an invitation message to another user with a code.
- When a user accepts your invitation, he will appear on your map automatically. He will be able to see your location on his map as well.
- Create places (geographic areas) on the map. You can define places of your interest like your home, school or work. When you enter or leave those places your contacts will be notified.
- See if your contacts are still or moving. Locator tries to detect the user´s activity: walking, running, on a bike or vehicle.
- How to invite people to my map?
1 - In the main screen, click on the \"add users\" icon:
2 - You will see the invitation code and options on how to send it:
3 - Select the way and the user you want to send the invitation code, for example, send to Joey using Whatsapp:
4 - You will send a message that contains the invitation code and a link to download or open Locator:
5 - Done! That is all you need to invite another to appear on your map!
Tip: Check how to accept an invitation code from other people!
1 - In the main screen, click on the \"menu\" icon:
2 - You will see the item \"Type invitation code\", click on it:
3 - Type the invitation code you received in \"Invitation code\" field:
Now you can see the person who invited you on the map and vice-versa.
- How to add places on the map?
1 - Click on the \"add place\" icon in the main screen:
3 - Give a name to the place you want to create:
4 - Set the radius of the new place:
6 - Click on the \"SAVE\" button and the place will be added on your map:
That´s all! Now when your contacts arrive or leave this place you will receive a notification.
1 - The most common cause is when there is no Internet connection on your contact´s phone;
2 - Another cause is \"Battery saver\" settings on your contact´s phone:

Ask your contact to check if his phone has a \"Battery saver\" or \"Task manager\" app. These kind of apps usually block Locator from running in background and due to that the location does not update correctly.
How to solve this issue: Configure the \"Battery saver\" or \"Task manager\" giving permission to Locator run in background.
- Why the location is not accurate?
- To improve the GPS accuracy, keep your wifi turned on even when you are not using it.

- The accuracy may vary depending on the place you are. If you are inside a building you may experience poor accuracy in your location. When you are in a place with bad cellphone signal you may also experience bad accuracy.
In order to add more than 2 users and 1 place on your map you need to purchase Locator premium
- Unlimited users on the map!\n- Unlimited places!\n- No more ads!
Now you can add unlimited users and places!
Hi!\n\nI am using Locator App and it is cool!
I would like to invite you.
Invitation code not found. Check your code or ask a new one to the person that has invited you.
Send this unique invitation code to only 1 person.
Now you can send more invitations!
Place names must have 3 characters or more!

In order to work correctly, Family Locator needs permission to:

- Auto-start
- Run in background
Adjust your Battery Saver (or Task Manager) to allow Family Locator to run correctly.
Check the Help section to learn more.
Click on this icon to invite users to your map!
Say or send this invitation code to the person you want to add to your map.
To accept your invitation, they must enter a code that you will send when you click the button below:
The person you invited will appear on your map after accepting your invitation.
The invitation will be accepted through the code:
